page.title: 17A day in the life of a girl.
page.content: My name is Denise.I am 8. I live in Lower Street Islip.I wake up at 8 o'clock and have my breakfast which is Corn Flakes. I get dressed and clean my teeth then come downstairs and pack my lunch box and my bag and get my dog's lead and put it on him.Then I go to school.I work from 9 till 12 with one break for a snack.I have dinner at 12 and then go out to play.At 1.15 we come in and read for a bit and work till 3.30 with another short break in between.Then I go home and have my tea. I feed my dog,my hamster and my birds and watch television and go outside and water my plants.Then I get ready for bed.I come down with my three teddy bears.Their names are Silky,Cuddles,and Honey.Then I say goodnight to my Mum and Dad and go to bed with my teddies.
